body_html: I think we should mention (not sure where though) that the default values for the thresholds and epsilon are for DoubleTensor and will most certainly false trigger if using FloatTensor. This is a problem that appears quite often in the forum.
body_text: I think we should mention (not sure where though) that the default values for the thresholds and epsilon are for DoubleTensor and will most certainly false trigger if using FloatTensor. This is a problem that appears quite often in the forum.
body: I think we should mention (not sure where though) that the default values for the thresholds and epsilon are for `DoubleTensor` and will most certainly false trigger if using `FloatTensor`. This is a problem that appears quite often in the forum.
